entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to 900 metres late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
